title: BobLawblaw
author: BobLawblaw
created_time: October 08, 2023, 07:58:29 PMLast edit: October 09, 2023, 04:33:56 PM by BobLawblaw
content: So, the Bing Image Creator is really freaking fun.https://www.bing.com/images/createHere's what it thinks I look like.What about you folks?

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: The images generated are really slick.I just tried to generate for “Satoshi nakamoto” to see what they’ll come up with. LolThis is what they gave me,,,Although I pictured something different from what they generated for me, I had a man with grey hair on my mind, probably because that’s what always pops up when you search for satoshi nakamoto

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: Quote from: Cantsay on October 08, 2023, 08:12:33 PMThe images generated are really slick.I just tried to generate for “Satoshi nakamoto” to see what they’ll come up with. LolThis is what they gave me,,,Although I pictured something different from what they generated for me, I had a man with grey hair on my mind, probably because that’s what always pops up when you search for satoshi nakamoto  That's the difference between making it yourself and AI generated images but both have advantages and disadvantages like when you are planning to generate something that is in your mind but once you see it yourself then you will be disappointed because it is not what you are hoping for meanwhile for creating it yourself will take time and skills but you can get the outcome you wanted. Well, that's my opinion and how I see it and others may disagree with me and it's fine since we all have our opinions.

comments.author: BobLawblaw
comments.body: Wow, just got access to DALL-E 3 and it's really good too!!!

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Sorry for this necropost.I need a recommendation for some AI video creator tools. In other words, some tool with the help of which I could make some public figures say silly things.Preferably free, a 30-second limit is enough. The purpose is funCan you recommend something?

comments.author: Fatema Begum
comments.body: Some AI Related website make high quality look loke realistic 3d image i a also love always 3D high graphics photos.

comments.author: Roland_King
comments.body: AI generated pictures have created a huge response in the world.  AI pictures animation and quality is very high.  AI style cartoons and animation pictures look amazing.

comments.author: Mrcool75
comments.body: AI-generated images have created a lot of hype recently.  Many unique and incredible images are currently being created with artificial intelligence.  The pictures that were beyond the imagination of people.  It is hoped that better things can be done with AI in the future.
